commands_tech_tab.oldClientDescription: Settings for the old Dota 2 6.84 client. Camera distance, useful commands, and more.
commands_tech_tab.setUpperFPS: Set the upper FPS limit (fps_max 0 to remove the limit entirely)
commands_tech_tab.notReturnCameraOnSpawn: Do not return camera to base on respawn
commands_tech_tab.forceRightClickAttack: Last hitting allied creeps with right-click
commands_tech_tab.increaseHeroIconsOnMin: Enlarge hero icons on the minimap
commands_tech_tab.consoleCommandSelfCast: This console command speeds up self-casting by double-tapping Alt (do not set below 0.2!)
commands_tech_tab.copyFileWarning: Make a backup copy of this file in case of mistakes — you can always restore the original version
commands_tech_tab.openFile: Open it with Notepad++ or another text editor/decompiler
commands_tech_tab.searchStandardCameraHe: We search for <distance>{{distance}}</distance> - this is the standard camera height.
commands_tech_tab.needsValueNearSearch: We need two values in the search: next to it will be
commands_tech_tab.changeToRequiredDistan: Change to the required distance (up to 1400) and save. We recommend a camera height of 1285 for those who find it very unusual.
commands_tech_tab.saveFileRestartClient: Save the file, restart the client - the camera height should change
commands_tech_tab.replaceInGameFolder: The file needs to be replaced in the game folder
commands_tech_tab.quickCastsAndSelfCasti: Quick casts and self-casting via ALT
commands_tech_tab.setKeyALT: In the 'Casting' tab, set 'Key + ALT', switch to 'Quick casts', and set the same key
commands_tech_tab.colorSelectionAdvice: For color selection you can use
matchmaking_mode_description.1: Classic 5x5 game in Ranked All Pick mode. The rating changes with win or loss and is used to balance teams in future matches.
matchmaking_mode_description.2: 1-versus-1 mid lane game. A win is assigned after two enemy deaths or the destruction of their first tower.
matchmaking_mode_description.7: Tutorial mode against bots. Play with other beginners and defeat the bots to access regular 5v5 matches.
matchmaking_mode_description.8: A mode for more experienced players who want to play a calm and high-quality game without leavers. Rating changes with wins and losses, and access opens after 30 games played.
matchmaking_mode_description.13: Simplified mode with fast leveling and more gold. Great for training or quick games.

dev_version_indicator.pleaseWait: You can take a look at these guys for now, and the site will open as soon as it updates.
download_page.extractGame: Unpack the downloaded archive with the game, start Steam, and then run <dota>dota.exe</dota>
download_page.downloadingGame: While the game is downloading, join us at <telegram /> and <discord />! There's a lot of interesting stuff there, and they'll help you if you encounter any difficulties.
download_page.forPlayingWithPeople: This site was created for playing with other people: you can't simply press search in the client itself, as it will start a search in the current version of the game.
download_page.cantJustSearch: Therefore we have our own matchmaking, for which you need to <steamauth>log in via Steam</steamauth>. This is safe and required to search for online games.
download_page.steamAccountMustMatch: <attention>IMPORTANT:</attention> The Steam account for the game and on the site must match.
download_page.passTraining: You need to complete the training on the site: it's a regular game against bots. This will get you used to the old Dota, introduce you to the original heroes and their abilities, and set up the game and binds to your preferences.
download_page.trainingProcess: What you will have to do:
download_page.serversInRussia: <attention>IMPORTANT:</attention> Game servers are located within the Russian Federation. Players from Ukraine may benefit from a tool to bypass provider blocks.
download_page.setupSearch: <queue>Start searching for a game</queue> in mode <mode>{{mode}}</mode>
download_page.startGameClient: Launch Steam, then start the game client
download_page.connectButton: Join by clicking the button or using the console command
download_page.congratulations: Congratulations! You have completed your first online match! Now we are waiting for you <queue>in search</queue> in mode <mode>{{mode}}</mode>.
download_page.learnAbout: In the meantime you can study <history>match history</history>, <heroes>the strongest heroes</heroes> or <leaderboard>the leaderboard</leaderboard>.
download_page.downloadLibraries: You also need to download libraries for your system and extract them into the game folder
download_page.forOldDota: To play the old Dota, you need the old game client. This is not a mod: it's the real Dota from 2015.
download_page.dontClickMatchSearch: <attention>IMPORTANT:</attention> do not press match search in the game itself

drop_list.howToFindTradeLink: How to find the trade link?
drop_list.donationInfo: Any player can donate items to the project on Steam. The bot will automatically calculate the value of the items and add them to your internal balance. This balance can be used to pay for a subscription!

error_page.pageLoadFailed: An error occurred while loading the page {{statusCode}}
faq.title: Common issues when playing Dota 2 6.84
faq.description: Problems launching, configuring, and connecting to game servers
faq.items.version.title: Which version of the game is used?
faq.items.version.content.part1: We are playing on version 6.84c. This is the latest version of the game on
faq.items.version.content.part2: , and also the most popular patch by player count.
faq.items.safe.title: Is this safe?
faq.items.safe.content.part1: The client was downloaded directly from official Steam depots, so it is fully authentic. The servers run on Valve's official tool — srcds.exe, as expected. Therefore bans are not applicable.
faq.items.safe.content.part2: For site authentication, a secure Steam service using the OpenID protocol is used — it does not transmit login, password, or other personal data. This method has long been used on many third-party resources.
faq.items.ban.title: Can I play with a ban in Dota?
faq.items.ban.content.part1: Bans from the current version of Dota do not apply to this client — they are not carried over to this client. But if you regularly quit games, spoil matches for others, or behave in a blatantly toxic way, you may receive a ban here. We monitor order and don't turn a blind eye.
faq.items.console.title: How do I open the console?
faq.items.console.content: Bind it in the control settings and run the game via a batch file (the -console parameter is specified there).
faq.items.settings.title: My game settings keep resetting / quick casts aren’t working
faq.items.settings.content.part1: Disable Steam Cloud (for modern Dota and on Steam globally) and do not agree to synchronization. On the path
faq.items.settings.content.part3: in config.cfg, in the file's properties, uncheck Read-only if present.
faq.items.connection.title: I can't connect to the game server
faq.items.connection.content.checkAccoun: Check that the accounts on the site and Steam match.
faq.items.connection.content.ukraineNote: If you are in Ukraine or the previous methods did not help – try using tools to bypass internet provider blocks.
faq.items.connection.content.internetNot: If you are already using it, try disabling it.
faq.items.connection.content.redownload: Re-download and re-extract the client using 7-zip.
faq.items.newDota.title: I get a new Dota opening instead of the old one
faq.items.newDota.content.part1: Before connecting to the server, first open the old client. Enter the data from the table about the accepted game (in the format connect ip) into the console and press Enter.
faq.items.clientLimit.title: Only one dota 2 client per customer
faq.items.clientLimit.content.part1: Close the Dota client, whether the new or old one, if it's already open (kill the process via Task Manager). Only one Dota client can be running at the same time.
faq.items.dotaExeError.title: Dota.exe not found error
faq.items.dotaExeError.content.part1: You need to add a 'cd' command at the start of the .bat file using Notepad.
faq.items.dotaExeError.content.path: C:\Program Files (x86)\Dota 6.84 (replace with the path to the old Dota client)
faq.items.launchError.title: Game won't start, what should I do?
faq.items.launchError.content.part1: Most likely you're missing something. Possible solutions:
faq.items.launchError.content.possibleSo: You didn't extract the game's archive and are trying to launch the game. Extract the archive using 7-zip and run the game.
Try clearing Steam's download cache or switching accounts before launching the old client.
If nothing helps – reinstall the operating system.
faq.items.steamClient.title: Steam client is missing or out of date
faq.items.steamClient.content.part1: One of the options below will help you fix this issue:
faq.items.steamClient.content.solution4: Turn off Invisible mode in Steam
faq.items.steamClient.content.solution5: Run DOTA Classic and Steam as administrator
faq.items.launcherError.title: Failed to load the launcher DLL / Setup file 'gameinfo.txt' doesn't exist in subdirectory 'dota2'
faq.items.launcherError.content.part1: The game archive may not have fully extracted. We strongly recommend using 7-zip to extract.
faq.items.launcherError.content.part2: To fix this, ensure there are no Cyrillic letters in the path or extract the archive to the desktop. If that doesn't help, extract the game archive to the root of drive C: or D:
faq.items.graphicsAudio.title: Graphics / Audio artifacts
faq.items.graphicsAudio.content.driverIn: Reinstall your video driver, or install a newer version
faq.items.graphicsAudio.content.audioRes: Run the 'snd_restart' command in the Windows command prompt or reinstall the audio driver
faq.items.graphicsAudio.content.disableE: Disable all extra graphics options in the game settings
faq.items.graphicsAudio.content.switchTo: Switch from integrated to discrete graphics card
faq.items.graphicsAudio.content.ifNotHel: IF THE ABOVE HAS NOT HELPED:
faq.items.graphicsAudio.content.startupP: With launch parameters in the bat file, set: -dxlevel 80, 81, 90, 95, 98 or -gl
faq.items.keybindAbility.title: Is there a way to enable ability stopping with a single key (for example, Rearm on Tinker)?
faq.items.mouseBind.title: Is there a way to bind a function to the mouse wheel or remap camera movement?
faq.items.smartAttack.title: Can I enable 'smart attack'?
faq.items.smartAttack.content: No, there is no such feature.
faq.items.lobby15.title: Is there a way to create a separate 5x5 lobby with mode and other parameters?
faq.items.lobby15.content.part1: Yes, such a feature is available with a subscription
faq.items.lobby15.content.part3: or by agreement with the administration.
faq.items.meta.title: How can I study the meta of the old patch?
faq.items.meta.content.part3: on our website and join the
faq.items.replay.title: How can I watch a replay?
faq.items.replay.content.part1: On the page of the completed match, click the "Download replay" button. You will be redirected to a page with a detailed guide on how to view this replay, for example,

info_page.seo.title: About dotaclassic.ru
info_page.seo.description: Overall status of the project, who runs it, and a bit of history.
info_page.onlineOldDotaExplanation: This site helps you play the old version of Dota 2 online. We offer Steam login, convenient game search, a link to the client, support, and helpful materials by version.
info_page.freeOldDotaOpportunity: We give everyone the opportunity to play the old Dota online for free. If you break the rules, we may disable access to the service.
info_page.differencesExplanation: The game now looks completely different from 10 years ago. Some people like the changes, some don’t, and we’re not saying that the old version is the best. But trying the original can be interesting for everyone. Here is how they differ:
info_page.oldMapDetails: The old map has fewer neutral creep camps, Roshan in the river, and side shops.
info_page.heroStatsDetails: Heroes have much less health and mana and deal more damage - having 700 HP by the 15-minute mark is normal. Any ability on the lane costs a lot of mana, but also deals a lot of damage. Spending an ability to last-hit a creep is a much more important decision.
info_page.originalHeroesDetails: Original heroes and their abilities - many abilities that in the current version either do not exist or have changed a lot. For example, Pudge, which here is tied to the second skill.
info_page.roleSeparationDetails: A strict separation of roles: the support needs to gank to earn money. There are far fewer creeps on the map, and kills give a larger reward.
info_page.costToMaintainSite: How much does it cost to maintain this site?
info_page.fixedExpenseDetails: Mandatory: server rentals for hosting the website and other infrastructure services (storage, analytics, databases). This part is nearly fixed and costs about {{amount}} per month. In case of large surges, this part also needs to scale up, with costs increasing to {{amount}} per month.
info_page.scalableExpenseDetails: Scalable: depending on online activity, we need a varying number of game servers so that everyone has enough slots to play. This expense is easy to predict: one optimal game server yields 3-4 parallel games and costs {{amount}} per month. If online is high, like during Pari Rivals 6.84, with around 180 parallel players, we get about 30 parallel games, so the server costs will be {{amount}} per month.
info_page.advertExpenseDetails: Advertising: the most flexible part of the expenses. Here we depend heavily on market offers (which YouTubers are willing to collaborate for how much, for example), and, of course, our financial capabilities. We are always open to new collaborations, and we do not refuse cheap advertising :)
info_page.approximateExpenses: Total, you can expect approximate maintenance costs: at low online of 5-10 parallel games, around {{lowOnline}} per month. If online activity increases, advertising or publicity events trigger, costs can rise to {{highOnline}}.
info_page.projectTeam: Who is working on the project?
info_page.projectHistoryExplanation: Classic Dota has gone through many hands: Western enthusiasts were the first to host games in 2019. After that, there were two communities for quite a long time: Western and CIS in the form of Discord servers. Then from 2021 to the end of 2024 all games were on the site https://dota2classic.com. Since September 2024 to the present, all games are hosted on this site, developed and supported by:
info_page.developerDetails: {{name}} - the main developer of the site
info_page.communityManagerDetails: {{name}} - "community manager", liaison with public relations, advertising, reading long texts and generating smart phrases
info_page.wikiDeveloperDetails: {{name}} - developer of the wiki on items and heroes, the main scapegoat for matchmaking experiments
info_page.contributorsList: List of people who contributed to the development of classic Dota:
info_page.ancient678Details: Ancient678 - created a CIS server for classic Dota
info_page.samovarDetails: Samovar Man - it was thanks to him that many players first saw Classic Dota
info_page.sittingBullDetails: SittingBull - built the first automated host servers via a Discord bot, wrote the first server plugins
info_page.deathTBODetails: DeathTBO - has kept the dota2classic.com site up for years
info_page.alisonDetails: Alison - wrote many useful server plugins
info_page.konakonaqqDetails: konakonaqq - helped in writing server plugins
info_page.otherContributors: Many others - whom it's hard to remember now, but they certainly were and helped
info_page.finalGoal: What is the ultimate goal of the project?
info_page.stableOnlineGoal: Stable online that allows roughly within 10 minutes to find a balanced game with players of similar level almost any time of day. A cozy place where everyone will enjoy playing: both newcomers to old Dota and seasoned veterans. The project's upkeep is fully funded by players, and there is a positive outlook for a stable flow of advertising.

player_settings.recalibrationDescription: Recalibration — a chance to reset your rating to the starting point and go through calibration again. Suitable for those who believe they deserve more or want to start from a clean slate. Recalibration can be used only once per season.
player_settings.avoidedPlayersInfo: Dotaclassic Plus subscribers can add up to one player to the avoided players list. This will prevent you from ever being teamed up with unpleasant players.
player_settings.connectTwitchProfile: Connect your Twitch profile to your account and gain additional features!
player_settings.twitchBenefits: After linking, your profile will display a link to your stream, and in chat a special icon that will stand you out among other users. If you are streaming our game, we will automatically show a link to your live stream so viewers can easily find your channel. This is a great way to attract a new audience and make your stream more noticeable! 🎮📺
player_settings.twitchRequirements: So that your stream appears on the main page, the game must be Dota 2, and the title must include dotaclassic.ru
please_go_queue.queueInfo: There are already {{inQueue}} in the queue!
project_statistics.matchesDetails: Among them, over 15,000 in 5x5 mode, 8,500 with bots, 3,500 in 1x1 mode
project_statistics.contentCreators: Content creators such as meeponegeroi, INBossik, Человек-Самовар, and many others also played our project
project_statistics.nostalgiaExperience: We strive to help everyone dive into nostalgia, or to try the original version of the game for the first time.
queue_page.onboarding.gameModes.title: Game modes
queue_page.onboarding.gameModes.content: Here is a list of game modes available for matchmaking. You can select multiple modes at once! To search for a 5v5 game, you need to win the training against bots.
queue_page.onboarding.party.title: Group
queue_page.onboarding.party.content: Here is your group: to invite a friend, press '+'
queue_page.onboarding.onlineStats.conten: Here you can see how many players are currently playing and how many are online on the site
queue_page.onboarding.chat.title: General chat
queue_page.onboarding.chat.content: A general chat for all players — here you can report problems and receive help.
queue_page.onboarding.searchButton.title: Search button
queue_page.onboarding.searchButton.conte: When you select a mode to search for, press this button to start searching for a game.
queue_page.onboarding.adblock.title: Adblock
queue_page.onboarding.adblock.content: Please disable ad-blocking on this site. Although the game is completely free here, maintaining the project still costs money. Enjoy the game!
queue_page.seo.title: Find a game
queue_page.seo.description: Game search page for old Dota. Play in a group with your friends, bots, and other players.

records_page.seo.title: Server records
records_page.seo.description: Records set by players on dotaclassic.ru on the old patch 6.84c
report_modal.commentPlaceholder: If you want the player to actually receive punishment, specify what happened: behavior, quotes, moments from the match. Remember: frequent inaccurate or unfounded reports may disable the ability to submit reports.
report_page.seo.title: Complaint {{title}}
forum_reports.seo.title: Reports
search_game_button.someoneInGame: Someone in the group is playing
select_image_decoration.title: Title: {{title}}
steam_auth_error.steamNotResponding: Steam is currently not responding to authorization requests!
steam_auth_error.pleaseTryLater: Please try to sign in again later.
steam_auth_error.steamSitesLostAccess: All sites accessible via Steam currently no longer have this capability.
steam_auth_error.soonFixed: We’re confident this will be fixed soon.
store_landing.title: dotaclassic plus
store_landing.subscriptionText: You help develop classic Dota: online play is growing, matches are getting better, and new features are appearing. And you also get nice privileges and exclusive features — as a thank you for your support.
store_landing.profileDecorationText: Choose from a variety of styles, borders, and effects to express your personality and stand out from others. Let your profile speak for you even without words.
store_landing.dodgeListText: Looks like you’re back together? Not today. Add the player to your dodge list — and you won’t be in the same team anymore. Tired of the same “match heroes”? Build your perfect lineup at least from one side of the screen.
store_landing.unbanHeroText: Has a hero been banned? This is not a reason to give up your favorite character. dotaclassic plus subscribers can choose banned heroes.
store_landing.inGamePraiseText: You can support a teammate for a diligent game — or lightly taunt your opponent for a mistake. Just like in the current version. Added so there’s a bit more emotion even in classic.
store_landing.muteText: No longer want to read messages, receive invites, or see others' comments on your profile? Block the player — and they’ll disappear from your game space. Peace of mind guaranteed.
store_landing.lobbyText: Gather your friends, choose a map, enable (or disable) bots and decide for yourself how the match will unfold. Private game — your rules, your pace, your team.
store_landing.recalibrationText: Once per season you can reset your rating to the starting point and replay 10 calibration games. Maybe this time the system will realize who’s the real fighter for MMR?
threads_table.author: Author
ticket_page.seo.title: {{title}}
tickets_page.seo.title: Support
vacancies_page.seo.title: Who we need
vacancies_page.projectNeeds: What talents the dotaclassic project needs
vacancies_page.projectIntro: Project <project>{{project}}</project> is sustained by the enthusiasm of people for whom old DotA is more than just a 'mod'. We welcome any help, but, unfortunately, unpaid - the project is non-commercial and all profits go to development.
vacancies_page.volunteerNote: All 'vacancies' imply there is no monetary compensation, but the candidate is not expected to have an outsized impact.
vacancies_page.productManagerDescription: Our project really needs a person who will guide the product's development. We have development resources, a bit of analytics, but we spend too little time interacting with users and are developing in a 'typical' direction.
vacancies_page.contentManagerDescription: We have a Telegram channel, a Discord server, TikTok and YouTube – but there is very little content there and it is not being produced regularly. Developing a content plan and regularly posting to the channels – we simply don't have enough hands for all of that.
vacancies_page.productAnalystDescription: We have a metrics platform and analytics setup, but lack professionalism. Creating analytical queries, building product dashboards in Grafana, and most importantly - understanding user behavior and formulating hypotheses.
vacancies_page.frontendDevDescription: The main site is built with NextJS, but some components (for example, item previews) are written in Vue. Many exciting features await development, as well as refactoring of the existing codebase.
vacancies_page.uiDesignerDescription: The site has a 'seed' of a style, but lacks an overall design system and structure. An experienced designer will help us achieve consistency, visual stability, and usability.
vacancies_page.devopsDescription: Support and enhancement of multiple VPS machines. Our main app runs in docker-compose, while game servers are run on separate smaller servers.
vacancies_page.backendDevDescription: The backend mainly consists of NestJS services communicating via REST, RabbitMQ and Redis. Main tasks - implementing new features in existing services, creating new services, writing and maintaining integration and unit tests.
vacancies_page.srcdsDevDescription: A very specialized job - development and maintenance of existing SourceMod plugins, configuring configs, and working with other Source tools such as Hammer and others.
vacancies_page.discordModeratorDescripti: We would gladly welcome help with configuring the Discord server to be easy to use, ensure important information is easily accessible for newcomers, and make it easy for moderators to maintain order.
vacancies_page.contactInstruction: Message me on Telegram. Please specify what exactly you're interested in and tell me about your experience — I would be very interested!
